testimonials.text: Very clean and most machines are kept in good working condition. Not crowded and has lots of options.
testimonials.name: Tina B.

testimonials.text: Small convenience store attached to laundromat. Bathroom on site. There was a guy there constantly cleaning and making sure everything was in order. Couldn't ask for more.
testimonials.name: Rochelle F.

testimonials.text: I went on Google last night and scoped out what laundromats were near UCR, considering I am a student there. The facilities were really clean and really satisfactory. The prices are incredibly reasonable.
testimonials.name: Bradford C.

testimonials.text: Clean, quiet, not overcrowded. Small convenience store attached to laundromat. Bathroom on site. There was a guy there constantly cleaning and making sure everything was in order. Couldn't ask for more.
testimonials.name: Christian P.

testimonials.text: I went on Google last night and scoped out what laundromats were near UCR, considering I am a student there. The facilities were really clean and really satisfactory. The prices are incredibly reasonable. The washer beyond exceeded my expectations. I don't  know what the machines are made of, but the washers are miracle workers. The stains got off and the shorts look the same way they did when I bought them.
testimonials.name: Tulsi M.

testimonials.text: This place is clean and maintained. Clothes get washed well and there's even a place where you can fold them. Staff is friendly and generous. I don't have a washer at my house, so I come here every two weeks and never had a problem. There are no long waits either :)
testimonials.name: Abraham G.

testimonials.text: This place was nice and clean. It's not too far from my place. Price is good and you can use quarters to wash & dry. Laundry cards are annoying. I just needed to wash one load., so $1.25 to wash & 50 cents (25 cents per 10min) to dry my stuff was great. I'm sure I'll be back to wash again.
testimonials.name: Sergio S.

testimonials.text: This place gets the job done and not to mention is fairly cheap.
testimonials.name: Lola Patricia Aguiar.

testimonials.text: I love it when it's just me doing laundry :):):)
testimonials.name: Ken Yousif

testimonials.text: It was good. Very small place. Person working here seemed friendly and offered me assistance if i needed.
testimonials.name: Michael Miller
